ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: i can not answer almost all of those questions hehe it was a thought, cause i know that later in the game, you can make your own weapons if you have the skill,
ygData.messageBody:
i can not answer almost all of those questions hehe
it was a thought, cause i know that later in the game, you can make your own
weapons if you have the skill, and the mold. so, perhaps you could make the
totem staff?

----- Original Message -----
From: Petra Fiene <pfi@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 1:59 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: bronze weapons


> From: "Petra Fiene" <pfi@...>
>
> what do you mean by making the staff, with tradeskill smithing?
> i cant do smithing, but what components are necessary, what skilllevel
> approx. ... any kind totem? i saw totems for sale in Neriak as well
>
> -----Urspr∩┐╜ngliche Nachricht-----
